non_compliance_reasons.A: No We Card or equivalent signage in visible location
non_compliance_reasons.B: PM or Retailer-Owned Industry Pack Fixture(s) (PK) or PM or Retailer-Owned Industry Carton Fixture(s) not in the #1 visible NSS staffed (TC)/NSS (CR) location or #1 SS line of sight location
non_compliance_reasons.C: Total space allocated to Industry Fixture(s) is not equal to the greater of CPL 1: 33% or 2', CPL 2: 50% or 3, CPL 3: 100% or 3
non_compliance_reasons.D: No PM or Retailer-Owned Industry FF Pack Fixture (Plan TC/CR) / PM or Retailer-Owned Industry FF Pack Fixture not exclusive (TC/CR CPL 2 & 3 only) No PM OPM/PM not exclusive OPM (KS)
non_compliance_reasons.I: No Marlboro Counter / Checklane Display in the #1 location No OPB Counter / Checklane Display in the #2 or #3 location No Basic Counter / Checklane Display in the #1 discount location (where required)
non_compliance_reasons.J: Lack of fair share of FF pack facings on Counter/Checklane Display(s)
non_compliance_reasons.N: Sales of promotion to non-consumer / Refusal to prebook / Refusal to assemble display or POS / Non-performance with promotion requirement
non_compliance_reasons.P: Non-acceptance of recommended PM new brands
non_compliance_reasons.R: Misuse of Growth Funds / Materials / Promotions / Incentives / Coupons
non_compliance_reasons.S: Lack of compliance with agreed upon Plan-O-Gram
non_compliance_reasons.V: No exclusive permanent PM signage / Enhanced signage
